required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Dose Escalating Study to Determine the Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of a Single Dose of Androxal in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A DOSE ESCALATING STUDY TO DETERMINE THE TOLERABILITY AND PHARMACOKINETICS OF A SINGLE DOSE OF ANDROXAL IN HEALTHY VOLUNTEERS

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: To determine the tolerability and pharmacokinetics (PK) of a single dose of Androxal in healthy adult male subjects as the dose to be investigated in a thorough QT interval/corrected QT interval (QT/QTc) study.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.description: Cmax of a single dose each of 125 mg of Androxal and 250 mg Androxal

arm_group.description: 5 x 25 mg Androxal capsules given as a single dose
10 x 25 mg capsules given as a single dose
